DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Studying gene express sample tissue patient abnormal cell may help doctor identify biomarkers related cancer . PURPOSE : This clinical trial identify biomarkers early detection cancer woman cervical dysplasia carcinoma situ cervix .
DOC.brief_title: Identifying Biomarkers Early Detection Cancer Patients With Cervical Dysplasia Carcinoma Situ Cervix
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : Primary - To identify catalogue genetic alteration protein change associate developmental stage cervical cancer . - To identify ranked list candidate gene drive transformation premalignant lesion tumor study validation molecular target novel early detection treatment design . Secondary - To complete genome scan high density analysis gene protein expression identify recurrent genetic protein change cancer . - To confirm change cluster specific chromosomal region harbor tumor suppressor oncogene . OUTLINE : Patients undergo biopsy cervical tissue follow loop electrocautery excision procedure ( LEEP ) ( remove tissue surround area biopsied ) . RNA , DNA , protein extract cell provide material construction libraries Serial Analysis Gene Expression ( SAGE analysis ) ; hybridization Bacterial Artificial Chromosome Comparative Genome Hybridization array ( BAC CGH array ) ; analysis use protein chip array proteomics . Resulting data cod sample provide gene expression protein profile . The coded molecular datasets link , analyze , compare use variety statistical software identify putative gene , gene alteration , proteins interest . Some sample may bank future study .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Histologically cytologically confirm premalignant lesion , dysplasia , carcinoma situ cervix Clinically document disease Attending Vancouver General Hospital refer colposcopy loop electrocautery excision procedure ( LEEP ) PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Not pregnant No lack inform consent due language difficulty , physical mental condition PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : No prior operation removal cervix Concurrent therapy allow
